name: SM4RT
description:
SM4RT: Space Multiplayer 4x Roguelike Thing

You are one of many disconnected contingents of humanity, after an apocalyptic happenstance that closed off warp travel. The warp is finally safe to travel once more, after many centuries... and you want to reunite humanity under your banner. Mechanics-wise, you'll be gathering resources, allocating them to scaling your industry, war machine, and exploration. You will encounter other pockets of humanity you must do combat with, and some of them may fight back...

---

Developed for the 2021 Global Game Jam period of January 29th - 31st. The core theme of the jam was "Lost & Found" and the project's diversifiers were Starlight and RNG.
